nodes.text: Prothee was a male Human lieutenant who served in the army of the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War fought between the Republic and the Sith Empire. In 3640 BBY, during the Battle of Ilum, Lieutenant Prothee sold armor to Republic forces from a booth in the Republic base camp on the planet Ilum. While stationed on Ilum, he carried a blaster pistol and wore white and black armor with a helmet that left his face unprotected. Prothee had brown eyes, dark hair, and tan-colored skin.

Lieutenant Prothee appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as an Armor Vendor for Republic players on Ilum. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, Prothee was removed from the game along with the rest of the Armor Vendors. His position was also marked on a map in Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, a game guide released by Prima Games.
